title: Bloomberg Markets: Wells Fargo's Nimmo on Real Estate Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Wells Fargo's Nimmo on Real Estate Investing
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Bill Nimmo\u0010National Director of Real Estate Asset Management\u0010Wells Fargo Private Bank\u0010Discussing why real estate returns are still hard to beat today, and how real estate bolsters overall portfolio returns over time (long term) and why it also makes sense in the short term.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
